entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Amqui
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow this morning. Local blowing snow this afternoon. Amount 20 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 40%
